TopicTitle: Some basic questions about Mass, Logs and everthing else

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have some questions about the program:

1.) When my rocket crash, explode a get a fine log of what happened when. How i got this window or just the log file for a successful flight?

2.) Is there any more elegant way to calculate the mass of my launchvehilce + payload then to type every part in the calculator?

Cheers

Weirdculture

Edited August 1, 2013 by WeirdCulture

1.) Pressing F3 during flight pauses the game and brings up the flight log - this might be what you need.

2.) http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-kerbal-engineer-redux-v0-5/ - The Engineer plugin gives you lots of useful information during building and during flight.
Thank You! Thats what I needed (how i set this to [Answered]?)

WeirdCulture,

You need to edit your original post title and change it to [Answered].

Digger412
